Race.GeneralTitle: Republican Parish Executive Committee Member at Large

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection District No. 1 -- 10 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 1 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 1 of the Parish of Livingston, Louisiana (the "District"), renew the levy and collection of a special tax of ten (10) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $170,000.00 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) (the "Tax"), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning in the year 2017 and ending in the year 2026, for the purposes of maintaining and operating the District's fire protection facilities, purchasing fire trucks and other fire-fighting equipment and paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes, including charges for fire hydrant rentals and service in and for said District?
